Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to mandatory retirement age
Summary: Relates to mandatory retirement age; increases the age at which a member must retire to receive an additional pension from sixty-two to sixty-five.
LawCode: Amd ยง384, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to mandatory retirement age
